titleStmt.title: An examination examined: being a full and moderate answer to Maior Innes relation concerning the siege and taking of the town of Leicester by the Kings forces, the last of May 1645.
titleStmt.author: Temple, Peter, Sir, 1622-1692.

publicationStmt.publisher: For J.W.J. dwelling in the Old-Bayley:,

notesStmt.note: Signed on page 16: Peter Temple, Vic. Thomas Hesilrige. Iohn Browne. Henry Smith. William Hewet. Francis Smalley. William Standley.
Imprint from colophon; publication date from Wing.
A reply to: Innes, James. An examination of a printed pamphlet, entituled, A narration of the siege of the town of Leicester (the last of May 1645.) (Wing I193).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
